Text.text: • Languages and Databases: Java (OOP, Spring Boot), C++ (STL), Python (Flask, Automation Scripts), Bash. • DevOps Tools and CI/CD: Jenkins, GitHub Actions, ArgoCD, SonarQube, OWASP Dependency Check, Trivy. • Containerization and Orchestration: Docker, Kubernetes (EKS, Helm), DockerHub. • Tools and Technologies: Git, GitHub, Postman, Linux, Next.js, REST APIs,Terraform, AWS (EC2, EKS, IAM, ECR)
